entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'he' and 'Harry'. The diary is proof that he is the heir of Slytherin.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A person who created Horcruxes, considered by Dumbledore to be of great importance. He has a past that Dumbledore is trying to understand.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as the house from which Harry is the heir.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Another one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as having a cup that became a Horcrux.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who is trying to understand Voldemort's past and find evidence about his Horcruxes.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects created by Voldemort that contain pieces of his soul. There are six in total, with three already identified.

entities.name: diary
entities.description: A Horcrux created by Voldemort, mentioned as proof that Harry is the heir of Slytherin.

entities.name: loket
entities.description: One of the Horcruxes, possibly created from Hufflepuff's cup.

entities.name: hufflepuff's cup
entities.description: An object that became a Horcrux.

entities.name: voldemort's past
entities.description: Dumbledore is trying to understand Voldemort's past in order to find evidence about his Horcruxes.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is trying to understand Voldemort's past and find evidence about his Horcruxes.
The diary is proof that Harry is the heir of Slytherin.
Voldemort created Horcruxes, which contain pieces of his soul.
Dumbledore believes that Hufflepuff's cup possibly became a Horcrux.
Voldemort created the locket, which is one of his Horcruxes.
Dumbledore is trying to find evidence about Voldemort's Horcruxes.
The diary is mentioned as proof that Harry is the heir of Slytherin.
